name: Cut Short
description:
(This is the first game i've ever made entirely alone. The game isn't finished, and i will be updating it, but that won't happen for a while.)

This is a first person based horror game, with looks inspired by the ps1 graphics.

You experience a car crash, and is led to a mysterious house.

(there is a game breaking glitch at the end that has a low chance of happening, sorry) 

Engine used: Unreal Engine 4
